---
title: "Create Persona Page Templates"
labels: [frontend,templates,persona-pages,medium-priority]
assignees: []
---


## Description
Create page templates for different persona tiers (Tier 1, Tier 2, Tier 3) with appropriate layouts and content structures.

## Template Requirements

### Tier 1 Template (Main Roles)
- **Leadership Focus**: Emphasize strategic contributions
- **Team Coordination**: Highlight cross-team collaboration
- **Strategic Achievements**: Focus on high-level impact
- **Vision and Direction**: Show strategic thinking

### Tier 2 Template (Sub-Roles)
- **Specialized Focus**: Emphasize domain expertise
- **Team Collaboration**: Show team interactions
- **Technical Achievements**: Highlight technical contributions
- **Process Improvements**: Show methodology contributions

### Tier 3 Template (Ultra-Specialized)
- **Niche Expertise**: Emphasize specialized knowledge
- **Technical Depth**: Show detailed technical work
- **Specialized Achievements**: Highlight niche contributions
- **Expert Consultation**: Show expert-level guidance

## Deliverables
- [ ] Create Tier 1 page template
- [ ] Create Tier 2 page template
- [ ] Create Tier 3 page template
- [ ] Implement template variations
- [ ] Add template documentation
- [ ] Test template functionality

## Acceptance Criteria
- Templates are appropriate for each tier
- Content structure is optimized for role type
- Templates are flexible and maintainable
- Documentation is complete and clear
